description: The underlying cause of the issue is related to a misconfiguration of the Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) partition on deployed devices. An identified problem involves the need to update this partition to address specific security vulnerabilities associated with CVE-2024-20666. The PowerShell script linked in the post is designed to automate the installation process, which includes resizing the WinRE partition to effectively apply the update. The misconfiguration can lead to various operational issues, including failure to boot into recovery mode when necessary. The relevant KB article, KB-5034957, provides guidance on managing this update effectively.
